data.name: Total War: THREE KINGDOMS – The Furious Wild Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Total War: THREE KINGDOMS – The Furious Wild Original Soundtrack brings to our audiences 24 evocative and stylised compositions from our expanded THREE KINGDOMS series.
This music in this content pack explores a more rustic delivery, fitting for the Southern tribes. Included here are mp3 and FLAC encoded files to suit your preferences
data.about_the_game:
Total War: THREE KINGDOMS – The Furious Wild Original Soundtrack brings to our audiences 24 evocative and stylised compositions from our expanded THREE KINGDOMS series.
This music in this content pack explores a more rustic delivery, fitting for the Southern tribes. Included here are mp3 and FLAC encoded files to suit your preferences
data.short_description: The complete soundtrack to The Furious Wild Expansion Pack, featuring 24 tracks in high quality MP3 and FLAC files

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 99 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 226 MB available space
